website_summaries.verdict: The car model kit of choice for anyone wanting something different from the usual sports car model.
pros: Good amount of detail on the small parts
Suitable for a customized paint job for semi-skilled or expert model builders familiar with gluing and painting techniques
cons: All parts come in a single color, requiring extra paint for more detailed and customized paint schemes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Clean mold no flashing. Nice build had a good time. Lot of different things in options you can do with this truck. Let yourself go wild and come up with something cool..
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Could be Colt Seavers truck!
customer_reviews.text: Nice model truck! I bought this to turn into the Fall Guy GMC from the old TV series. I believe this is the exact truck they used to make only in a different color and without any graphics. If you've put together a model like this before, no surprises here. This comes molded in one color so different parts will require you to paint them. There are also around 100 pcs and most have to be glues together. So, if getting for a present, remember the glue! Good detail and nice classic truck!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, missing parts tho
customer_reviews.text: Was a good truck, kinda vague instructions but I figured it out. The only complaint I have is there wasn't a windshield with it so I'm stuck until I get one
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the money, they don't make a chevy model so I bought this. The body is nice and has good details. The interior is 70's not 80's so if accuracy matters to you this model will irritate you. Either way it looks like a fun project.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Have fun
customer_reviews.text: Every part needs bent slightly and/or filed to fit properly. Maybe I’m not getting the whole point of building a model car but if you’re like me and just want to ASSEMBLE something, yours wont be show worthy. You need to custom build the wholeeeeeeeeeee truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Sibila

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: I am saving it to build with grandson 10 years from now, want open it till then. I had the real one in 84.
customer_reviews.author: ric dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality kit
customer_reviews.text: Havent built it yet but had to have it cuz it reminded me of my old square body
customer_reviews.author: kameron

customer_reviews.title: A fun and educational project.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He loved it and enjoyed the challenge of building it with his Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lifted 4x4
customer_reviews.text: If you’re into lifted trucks, then this is a great build! I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing square body of a pick up
customer_reviews.text: It's a great set. Just make sure to buy glue and paint. It doesn't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: D0B-RY0X

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product I used it to modify a different model and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Wihunting

customer_reviews.title: Great model
customer_reviews.text: I didn't order it but I bought the same kit at Walmart in Spokane Washington and I built it, came out great. My favorite part is it has a CB unit you can put on the dash.
customer_reviews.author: John Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Only reason not 5 stars was because model was missing wheels for the option to make it look stock
customer_reviews.author: john pecoraro

product_meta.title: MPC 1984 GMC Pickup (White) 1:25 Scale Model Kit
product_meta.description: Back by popular demand! MPC’s off-road 1984 GMC pickup is a modeler favorite. This special reissue is available molded in white for experienced modelers wanting to paint it any color they choose. It also features irresistible new packaging illustrations from Don Greer. With its off-road accessories, raised suspension, oversized tires and colorful new decal options. KIT FEATURES: Skill 2, paint and glue required Available molded in white Oversized hollow vinyl off-road tires Roll bar with spotlights; front bull bar Spoked, chrome mag wheels Detailed engine and chassis All new illustrated packaging and decals

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
